item.text: I solemnly charge you before God and Christ Jesus, who is going to judge the living and the dead, and by his appearing and his kingdom:

<st data-num="2784" class="">Preach</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st>,<n id="1" /> be <st data-num="2186" class="">ready</st><n id="2" /> whether it is <st data-num="2122" class="">convenient</st> or <st data-num="171" class="">not</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1651" class="">reprove</st>, <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuke</st>, <st data-num="3870" class="">exhort</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">complete</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">instruction</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> people<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="430" class="">tolerate</st> <st data-num="5198" class="">sound</st> <st data-num="1319" class="">teaching</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, <st data-num="2596" class="">following</st> <st data-num="2398">their own</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>,<n id="2" /> they will <st data-num="2002" class="">accumulate</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">teachers</st> for <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> because they have an <st data-num="2833">insatiable curiosity</st> to <st data-num="189" class="">hear</st> new things.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they will <st data-num="654">turn away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="189" class="">hearing</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the other hand they will <st data-num="1624" class="">turn aside</st> to <st data-num="3454" class="">myths</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">however</st>, be <st data-num="3525" class="">self-controlled</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>, <st data-num="2553">endure hardship</st>, <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> an <st data-num="2099">evangelistâ€™s</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>, <st data-num="4135" class="">fulfill</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> being <st data-num="4689">poured out as an offering</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="359" class="">depart</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2186">is at hand</st>.

I have <st data-num="75">competed</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">well;</st><n id="1" /> I have <st data-num="5055" class="">finished</st> the <st data-num="1408">race</st>; I have <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>!

Finally the crown of righteousness is reserved for me. The Lord, the righteous Judge, will award it to me in that dayâ€”and not to me only, but also to all who have set their affection on his appearing.
Make every effort to come to me soon.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1214" class="">Demas</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1459" class="">deserted</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, since he <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3568" class="">present</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2332" class="">Thessalonica</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2913" class="">Crescens</st> went <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1053" class="">Galatia</st> and <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1149" class="">Dalmatia</st>.

<st data-num="3441" class="">Only</st> <st data-num="3065" class="">Luke</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="353" class="">Get</st> <st data-num="3138" class="">Mark</st> and <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st> him <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="2173">great help</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> I have <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="5190" class="">Tychicus</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2181" class="">Ephesus</st>.<n id="1" />

When you <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> with you the <st data-num="5341" class="">cloak</st> I <st data-num="620" class="">left</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5174" class="">Troas</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2591" class="">Carpas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">scrolls</st>, <st data-num="3122" class="">especially</st> the <st data-num="3200" class="">parchments</st>.
Alexander the coppersmith did me a great deal of harm. The Lord will repay him in keeping with his deeds.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="5442">be on guard</st> against <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="3029" class="">vehemently</st> <st data-num="436" class="">opposed</st> <st data-num="2251" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="627" class="">defense</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">appeared</st> in <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> support; <st data-num="235" class="">instead</st> they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1459" class="">deserted</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>â€”may <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="3049">held accountable</st> for it.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">stood</st> by <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1743" class="">strengthened</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="2782" class="">message</st><n id="1" /> would be <st data-num="4135">fully proclaimed</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>. <st data-num="2532">And so</st> I was <st data-num="4506" class="">delivered</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3023">lionâ€™s</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>!
The Lord will deliver me from every evil deed and will bring me safely into his heavenly kingdom. To him be glory for ever and ever! Amen.
Greetings to Prisca and Aquila and the family of Onesiphorus.

<st data-num="2037" class="">Erastus</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2882" class="">Corinth</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5161" class="">Trophimus</st> I <st data-num="620" class="">left</st> <st data-num="770" class="">ill</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3399" class="">Miletus</st>.

<st data-num="4704">Make every effort</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="5494" class="">winter</st>. <st data-num="782" class="">Greetings</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> from <st data-num="2103" class="">Eubulus</st>, <st data-num="4227" class="">Pudens</st>, <st data-num="3044" class="">Linus</st>, <st data-num="2803" class="">Claudia</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>.<n id="1" />
The Lord be with your spirit. Grace be with you.
